hero.title: About Marshrutka
hero.subtitle: A premium transport company connecting Ukraine with Europe with comfort and safety.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text1: Our mission at Marshrutka is to provide safe, comfortable, and affordable transport from Ukraine to Europe. We focus on quality, convenience, and premium service for our clients.
mission.text2: Our team ensures that every trip is smooth and enjoyable, from booking to arrival.

safety.title: Safety
safety.text: Your safety is our top priority on every trip.

comfort.title: Comfort
comfort.text: Modern buses with spacious seats and premium amenities.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.text: Accurate schedule and seamless booking process.

cta.title: Ready to Travel?
cta.text: Book your next trip with Marshrutka and experience premium comfort on the road.

package.name: Parcel
package.alreadyUnavailableEror: Unfortunately someone reserved space for the baggage/parcel while you were filling out the form. Try reducing the parcel size or select another date.
package.tooBigError: Unfortunately this parcel will not fit...

support.title: Support & FAQs
support.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions or contact our team.
support.contactSubtitle: Our support team is always ready to assist you.

faqs.a: Marshrutka.Store is a service for fast and affordable shipment of parcels or documents between cities.
Select the route, enter the size and weight of the parcel, confirm the order, and track delivery online.

faqs.q: What are the size and weight limits?
faqs.a: We accept parcels from 10 to 1000 mm per side and up to 50 kg in weight.
Yes, document delivery is supported and has fixed parameters.
Tracking is available in your account or via the link sent to your email.
You can retry the saved parcel or contact support.
Yes, all parcels have basic insurance. Additional insurance can be purchased if desired.
Write to support@marshrutka.store or use the feedback form on the website.
